rubric.p: Complete the rules for the game.

block.p: Can you find the treasure in the 1 tomb? You’re an 2 archeologist. You have to get past the two gold 3 statues – they’re the 4 guards of the tomb – and find your way to Tutankhamun. But hurry! You have to take the 5 mask from the face of the 6 mummy before the thieves get there! On the way, you can collect bracelets to wear on your arm. These give you extra powers. Oh, and watch out for snakes! Good luck!
